name: Airport Bus Simulator 3D. Real Bus Driving & Parking For kids
name_original: Airport Bus Simulator 3D. Real Bus Driving & Parking For kids
description:
Download Airport Bus Simulator 3D and Play our new free game.

You are playing the role of an airport bus driver and your job is to transport bus passengers from one terminal to the other terminal. Avoid other vehicles like big trucks, heavy trucks, cars, buses and airplanes parked at the airport. Pick and transport the passengers to the airplane from the terminal. Watch your damage bar at the bottom. Earn money to buy and upgrade buses. If you like speed parking games, truck simulator games, car parking and casual games, then you will love to play this FREE game of 3D.

GAME FEATURES:-

- 100% free gameplay.
- Excellent HD Graphics and backgrounds.
- NEW Gear with Turbo FAST speed.
- Game Center integrated for leader boards and achievements.
- Easy and smooth steering control.

So what are you waiting for? Get ready for action.

How to Play:-
Tap your phone/tablet on right to change "Gears ìand race.
Control the steering on left side.

Check out our free games previews, game trailers, videos and more free apps in the future.
Subscribe us at:

This game is suitable for all kind of genres from kids, girls and boys of all ages.

If you have any problem in installation, please report to us. We will try to fix it as soon as possible.
